name: One-Pot Hot Dog Pasta
description: This one-pot hot dog pasta is the ultimate comfort food that's quick and easy to make. The addition of hot dogs gives it a playful twist that both kids and adults will enjoy.
instructions: In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the garlic and onion and sauté until softened.
Add the hot dogs and tomatoes and stir to combine. Season with the sugar, salt, and pepper.
Stir in the cream, penne, and water. Cover and cook for 15 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes to prevent the pasta from sticking to the bottom of the pot.
Turn off the heat, stir in the green onions, then cover again. Let sit for 5 minutes.
Serve warm with Parmesan cheese for topping.
